thread.title: BRIEF-China Success Finance Group Says ‍Success Guarantee To Provide A Litigation Guarantee

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Success Finance Group Says ‍Success Guarantee To Provide A Litigation Guarantee

organizations.name: china success finance group holdings ltd
brief-china success finance group says ‍success guarantee to provide a litigation guarantee feb

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - China Success Finance Group Holdings Ltd :
* ‍SUCCESS GUARANTEE TO PROVIDE A LITIGATION GUARANTEE OF NOT MORE THAN RMB80 MILLION TO A PRC COURT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
